title: Dont Worry Be Happy Lyrics Nimirndhu Nil Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Dont Worry Be Happy
Singer(s): Gaana Bala
Lyrics: Gaana Bala
MOvie: Nimirndhu Nil
Music: GV Prakash

Vazhka oru veri pidicha kazhudha machi
munnaid pona kadikudhu
pinnadi pona udhaikudhu cha..

Dont worry be happy.
Idho vantaaruppa dolakku

Kozhi sandakellaam courtu-kellaam ponaalum.
kolandha porandha pinnay
konjam azhagu koranjaalum.
Aadi maasam manaivi amma veetuku ponaalum.
adutha maasam unnaku
panjaayatha vachaalum.

dont worry dont worry be happy
dont worry dont worry be happy

Adagu vacha porulu elathula ponaalum.
Adhuku nee sariyillanu
yelanamaa sonnaalum.
Koratta vittadhuku diverse thaan ketaalum.
Kozhambula uppu illanu
purusan unna thittinaalum.
Kiss adicha paiyyan vera
ponnu kooda ponaalum.
KIss adicha unna pottu
petti case-u pottaalum.

Pathaam class-u nallaa padichi
failu thaaney aanaalum.
Power star-u vandhu kooda
current-u cut aanaalum.

dont worry dont worry be happy
dont worry dont worry be happy

Veettoda maapulanu kevalamaa sonnaalum.
Veppaati pecha ketu
purusan unna adichaalum.
Aathula pora thanniya yaarum
mondhu kudichaalum.
Veetula moonu vela thandasoru thinnaalum.

Onnumilla matter-uku ooru
serndhu adichaalum.
CHumma suthuna paavathuku
thaali katta sonnaalum.
Thaali kattum nerathula
ponnu kaanaam ponaalum.
Pension vaangura anti unna
tension-u thaan pannaalum.

dont worry dont worry be happy
dont worry dont worry be happy

Kozhi sandakellaam courtu-kellaam ponaalum.
kolandha porandha pinnay
konjam azhagu koranjaalum.
Aadi maasam manaivi amma veetuku ponaalum.
adutha maasam unnaku
panjaayatha vachaalum.

dont worry dont worry be happy
dont worry dont worry be happy
